document.full_text: it is time for the united nations to transform its mission in haiti, which needs engineers and bulldozers more than soldiers and tanks, outgoing haitian president rene preval said on wednesday.
document.title: haiti's preval to u.n.: we need bulldozers, not tanks
lines_and_colors: it is time for the united nations to transform its mission in haiti, which needs engineers and bulldozers more than soldiers and tanks, outgoing haitian president rene preval said on wednesday.
